trans-unit.source: The final stage of this tutorial is to build and run your new app.
trans-unit.target: The final stage of this tutorial is to build and run your new app.

trans-unit.source: Browse to the location where you saved the compressed project files, expand the files on your computer, and open the project file using Xcode.
trans-unit.target: Browse to the location where you saved the compressed project files, expand the files on your computer, and open the project file using Xcode.

trans-unit.source: Press the **Run** button to build the project and start the app in the iPhone emulator.
trans-unit.target: Press the **Run** button to build the project and start the app in the iPhone emulator.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_ and then click the plus (**+**) icon.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_ and then click the plus (**+**) icon.

trans-unit.source: This sends a POST request to the new mobile service hosted in Azure.
trans-unit.target: This sends a POST request to the new mobile service hosted in Azure.

trans-unit.source: Data from the request is inserted into the TodoItem table.
trans-unit.target: Data from the request is inserted into the TodoItem table.

trans-unit.source: Items stored in the table are returned by the mobile service, and the data is displayed in the list.
trans-unit.target: Items stored in the table are returned by the mobile service, and the data is displayed in the list.
